title: The Writer's Almanac - Thursday, November 12, 2020
description: It's the birthday of Roland Barthes (1915-1980), who applied sophisticated literary theory to things like movies, stripteases, toys, and wrestling matches.
itunes:author: Prairie Home Productions
itunes:subtitle: It's the birthday of Roland Barthes (1915-1980), who applied sophisticated literary theory to things like movies, stripteases, toys, and wrestling matches.
